page.title: 03Farms - A General Survey
page.content:
The{Farmhouses}range in{age}from{50} to {500 years.}Some of the farmers have lived on the farms all their lives. Some employ{labourers}but most are assisted by their{families.}The average size of the farms is{195 {acres.
The{main crops}grown are{wheat,barley {oats}and{potatoes. Cattle}are kept for {beef}and{milk.}Several Farms have {sheep,}mainly Suffolk crosses.{Several farmers use {sheep dogs.
The{farmers}all pay a{weekly visit to{Bridgnorth Livestock Market.}The {average}time of{rising}is{7 a.m.,}with {11 p.m.}for{bedtime.
Most farmers managed to have a {holiday,}varying from 2 weeks annually to " 3 weeks in 23 years!"
